content:
### **🔥 Customized Outreach Messages for Tier 1 AI Influencers**  

Each message is tailored to **why they’d be interested** and **why you’re reaching out.** Send these as:  
📌 **Connection request messages (LinkedIn)**  
📌 **DMs (LinkedIn/Twitter) if they accept**  

---

### **1️⃣ Steve Nouri (AI Thought Leader, OpenAI Ambassador)**  
📌 **Why Him?**  
- One of the **most active AI voices on LinkedIn**  
- Posts frequently about **AI’s impact on jobs & hiring**  

**💬 Message:**  

> **Hey Steve,**  
> Your insights on AI's impact on hiring are 🔥—and I’m putting it to the test.  
>  
> I’m running a live experiment showing how AI is already eliminating white-collar jobs **before hiring models can adapt.**  
>  
> Would love your take—especially on **how companies should rethink hiring in this new era.** Just posted an AI-driven breakdown—keen to hear your thoughts!  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Appreciate your work & would love to connect!  

---

### **2️⃣ Allie K. Miller (AI Investor & Advisor, Ex-Amazon AI)**  
📌 **Why Her?**  
- **Deeply involved in AI career shifts & upskilling**  
- Engages on **AI-driven hiring & automation**  

**💬 Message:**  

> **Hey Allie,**  
> I know you’ve been a big advocate for AI-driven upskilling—so I wanted to get your take on something.  
>  
> I’m running a live AI experiment to **redefine hiring in an AI-first world.** Instead of looking at experience & skills, we’re testing **how well candidates can implement AI to replace jobs.**  
>  
> Would love your perspective—especially on how **companies should rethink hiring models.**  
>  
> Just posted a breakdown on this—keen to hear your thoughts!  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Let’s connect!  

---

### **3️⃣ Matt Shumer (CEO, HyperWrite AI, AI Startup Founder)**  
📌 **Why Him?**  
- Founder of an **AI-powered job automation tool**  
- Actively engages on **AI replacing work functions**  

**💬 Message:**  

> **Hey Matt,**  
> Given your work at HyperWrite, I figured you’d appreciate this—**we’re running an AI experiment that puts hiring models to the test.**  
>  
> Instead of filtering candidates by experience, we’re using AI to **redefine qualifications based on execution**—measuring how well someone can apply AI to automate a role.  
>  
> Would love your take on this—especially how you see AI shaping the hiring process in the near future. Just shared a breakdown—keen to get your thoughts.  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Let’s connect!  

---

### **4️⃣ Santiago Valdarrama (AI Engineer, Educator, Content Creator)**  
📌 **Why Him?**  
- Shares **AI job market insights**  
- Posts often about **AI’s impact on employment trends**  

**💬 Message:**  

> **Hey Santiago,**  
> Your takes on AI’s impact on the job market are spot on—so I wanted to get your thoughts on something we’re testing.  
>  
> I’m running a live experiment to see how **AI itself would hire candidates**—by measuring how well they implement AI, not just their resume.  
>  
> Just posted a breakdown on this—curious to hear your thoughts.  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Would love to connect!  

---

### **5️⃣ Louis Bouchard (AI Communicator, Runs "What’s AI?")**  
📌 **Why Him?**  
- **Simplifies AI concepts for business leaders & general audience**  
- Engages heavily on AI job market trends  

**💬 Message:**  

> **Hey Louis,**  
> Love the work you do at **What’s AI?**—making AI concepts accessible.  
>  
> I’m running an AI experiment on **how hiring should change in an AI-first world.** Instead of looking at years of experience, we’re testing how well candidates can **use AI to automate their own roles.**  
>  
> Would love your take—especially on how AI education should shift in response. Just posted about this—keen to hear your thoughts!  
>  
> [Insert LinkedIn Post Link]  
>  
> Let’s connect!  

---

### **🔥 Execution Plan – What’s Next?**  
✅ **1️⃣ Send Connection Requests with These Messages**  
✅ **2️⃣ If Accepted, DM them the full message with post link**  
✅ **3️⃣ Engage with their latest posts first** (LinkedIn/Twitter) to warm them up  

🚀 **This is strategic, high-impact outreach—ready to start sending?**
